attributes.action: ban all tobacco related products in britain.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: its about time that it was banned the government needs to address this problem imediatly because all the time people are dieing from tobacco related conditions statistics show that the equivalent of a jumbo jet crashing with no survivors EVERY DAY so do something NOW! its immoral and inhuman to let this happen.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
